content: this soap saver is a perfect addition to your bath spa set it s great for using with a full bar of soap inside to exfoliate and double as a wash cloth alternatively you can use it to collect all the little end bits of soap bars - when it gets filled up it s like having a whole bar of soap again upon purchase you will receive a beautiful pdf pattern ready for download the pattern is easy and approachable with clear pictures to help you along the way i am always available to help as well this pattern is written in us terms materials needed -yarn aran 100% organic cotton yarn -hook 4 50 mm -scissors -tapestry needle -stitch markers this soap saver is also included in a comprehensive bath spa pattern bundle as well the bundle includes a soap saver washcloth loofah pouf face scrubbie + basket you can find the pattern bundle in my etsy shop - alpine bath spa set _________________ this pattern or parts of it may not be reproduced sold distributed or translated without authorization from off the beaten hook you can sell your finished items provided that you credit off the beaten hook as the designer but you may not use my photos for your listing thank you for your respectfulness thank you for supporting my small business when you support a small business you support a dream join the off the beaten hook community for lots of free patterns video tutorials and tons of downloadable crochet resources blog https //offthebeatenhook com/ instagram https //www instagram com/offthebeatenhook/ etsy https //www etsy com/shop/offthebeatenhook
